title: Push-Up
text: Hands under shoulders, ribs down, full ROM. Regress: incline. Progress: weighted. Cues: elbows ~45°; don't flare.

title: Dumbbell Flat Press
text: Set scapula, elbows ~45° from torso, soft lockout. Progress: tempo 3s down. Regress: incline push-up.

title: RIR (Reps In Reserve)
text: RIR = reps left at end of a set. 0 RIR = max. Hypertrophy commonly 0–3 RIR depending on movement/fatigue.

title: Push Day — 45 min
text: 4–6 exercises; 8–15 reps; 60–90s rest; aim 1–3 RIR. Flow: Horizontal press → Incline press → OHP → Laterals → Triceps.

title: Safety Note
text: Educational, not medical advice. Consult a professional for pain or conditions.
